name: kunk_deathspecial_01
text: I'll be back for you, Tidehunter.

name: kunk_deathspecial_03
text: Tidehunter, your blood runs with bilgewater!

text: I trawl your guts with my blade!

name: kunk_kill_11
text: Heh! You'll always be my chum!

name: kunk_killspecial_01
text: Tidehunter, Ill dry your clammy skin in the sun.
text_simple: tidehunter ill dry your clammy skin in the sun

name: kunk_killspecial_02
text: May the crabs eat you, Tidehunter, nerve by living nerve.
text_simple: may the crabs eat you tidehunter nerve by living nerve

name: kunk_killspecial_03
text: May the surf run green with your scurvy blood, Tidehunter.
text_simple: may the surf run green with your scurvy blood tidehunter

name: kunk_killtideship_02
text: Tidehunter, eh? More like catch o' the day!
text_simple: tidehunter eh more like catch o the day

name: kunk_respawn_05
text: Hah! Any port in a storm.
text_simple: hah any port in a storm

name: kunk_respawn_06
text: All's shipshape from stern to scupper.
text_simple: alls shipshape from stern to scupper

name: kunk_respawn_07
text: A man never steps into the same sea twice.
text_simple: a man never steps into the same sea twice

name: kunk_respawn_08
text: True peace is only at sea.
text_simple: true peace is only at sea

name: kunk_rare_01
text: If the demons of the Cataract couldn't sink my fleet, then this lot doesn't stand a chance.
text_simple: if the demons of the cataract couldnt sink my fleet then this lot doesnt stand a chance

name: kunk_rare_02
text: I haven't seen such a pack of tree weasels since we rousted the Trembling Isles free of all the...tree weasels.
text_simple: i havent seen such a pack of tree weasels since we rousted the trembling isles free of all the tree weasels

text: Tidehunter, I'll rope your rotting carcass to my bow.

text: Well, Tidehunter, look what the tide washed in.

text: Sweetly sweetly blew the breeze, on me alone it blew.

text: Run up the sail while we've got the tide!

name: kunk_rival_04
text: You fell upon your own rocks, Siren.
text_simple: you fell upon your own rocks siren

name: kunk_rival_05
text: I stopped my ears against you, Siren.
text_simple: i stopped my ears against you siren

name: kunk_rival_06
text: Siren, you can stop calling me now.
text_simple: siren you can stop calling me now

name: kunk_rival_07
text: You're not the worst of your kind, Slardar, but you're typical of em.
text_simple: youre not the worst of your kind slardar but youre typical of em

name: kunk_rival_08
text: Tidehunter, where to begin? I know, with your end!
text_simple: tidehunter where to begin i know with your end

name: kunk_rival_09
text: I've nothing left to say to you, Tidehunter.
text_simple: ive nothing left to say to you tidehunter

name: kunk_rival_10
text: Curse my name all you like, Tidehunter, it only makes me grin.
text_simple: curse my name all you like tidehunter it only makes me grin

name: kunk_rival_11
text: I never tire of hearing my name on your lips.
text_simple: i never tire of hearing my name on your lips

name: kunk_rival_12
text: Tidehunter, I hear you've been calling me names behind my stern.
text_simple: tidehunter i hear youve been calling me names behind my stern

name: kunk_rival_13
text: Tidehunter, you left us too soon.
text_simple: tidehunter you left us too soon

name: kunk_rival_14
text: It's a special thing, the bond between a monster and an admiral.
text_simple: its a special thing the bond between a monster and an admiral

name: kunk_rival_15
text: Tidehunter, tell me how you really feel.
text_simple: tidehunter tell me how you really feel

name: kunk_rival_16
text: Oh I'll never have another nemesis like Tidehunter.
text_simple: oh ill never have another nemesis like tidehunter

name: kunk_rival_17
text: Ah, Tidehunter, you weren't all bad.
text_simple: ah tidehunter you werent all bad

name: kunk_rival_18
text: I'm going to miss that slimy wretch.
text_simple: im going to miss that slimy wretch

name: kunk_rival_19
text: No one put up a fight like good old Tidehunter.
text_simple: no one put up a fight like good old tidehunter

name: kunk_rival_20
text: It's a special thing, the bond between a monster and an admiral.
text_simple: its a special thing the bond between a monster and an admiral

name: kunk_rival_21
text: Go, hunt the tides of death now, old friend.
text_simple: go hunt the tides of death now old friend

name: kunk_rival_22
text: Ah, nobody hated me like Tidehunter. He made me feel appreciated.
text_simple: ah nobody hated me like tidehunter he made me feel appreciated

name: kunk_rival_23
text: He loved the sea, Tidehunter did, and for that I cannot hate him.
text_simple: he loved the sea tidehunter did and for that i cannot hate him

name: kunk_rival_24
text: As implacable foes go, Tidehunter, you were top notch.
text_simple: as implacable foes go tidehunter you were top notch

name: kunk_rival_26
text: Ah, Tidehunter, you were my better half.
text_simple: ah tidehunter you were my better half

name: kunk_rival_27
text: Ah, Tidehunter, you cared enough to hate me. You can't buy that sort of love.
text_simple: ah tidehunter you cared enough to hate me you cant buy that sort of love

name: kunk_rival_28
text: And a thousand thousand slimy things lived on, and so did I!
text_simple: and a thousand thousand slimy things lived on and so did i

name: kunk_rival_29
text: Full plain I see the devil knows how to row.
text_simple: full plain i see the devil knows how to row

name: kunk_rival_31
text: I thought I hated demons, but I didn't know what hate was till I met that Shadow Fiend.
text_simple: i thought i hated demons but i didnt know what hate was till i met that shadow fiend

name: kunk_rival_32
text: Shadow Demon, ye're but a shadow of the demon fleet I put down.
text_simple: shadow demon yere but a shadow of the demon fleet i put down

name: kunk_rival_33
text: Is Death truly that woman's mate?
text_simple: is death truly that womans mate

name: kunk_rival_35
text: I sought a port, not a portly.
text_simple: i sought a port not a portly

name: kunk_rival_36
text: He was a rather portly authority.
text_simple: he was a rather portly authority
